QUERY.TITLE: Italian paintings
QUERY.DESC: Find information on places where Italian paintings or drawings are exhibited or on show to the public .
QUERY.NARR: Relevant documents will report the locations of permanent or temporary exhibitions of Italian paintings anywhere in the world . Information on where single paintings or drawings by Italian artists are_on public view in museums , art_galleries , or similar , is also of interest . The information provided must be sufficient to identify the exact location , e.g. the name of a city or country is not sufficient .
